segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the water running from the faucet nonstop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full, and it's overflowing onto the counters and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a waste of water; someone should turn that off right away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman there is just polishing her plate, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's on, and she's in her own little world.

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, kids are up to no good with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on that shaky stool, stretching high to grab some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be a mess with dishes and water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's egging him on, reaching up like she can't wait.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks peaceful, totally unaware of the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing all these hazards building up.

segments.text: This could end badly if they don't snap out of it soon.
